metadata.title: CVE-2019-15860 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.description: Xpdf 2.00 allows a SIGSEGV in XRef::constructXRef in XRef.cc. NOTE: 2.00 is a version from November 2002.

notes.note: jdstrand> xpdf in koffice is 2.0 mdeslaur> no indication that poppler is vulnerable to this issue

criterions.comment: ipe package in impish is affected and may need fixing.
xpdf package in impish is affected and may need fixing.
